alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:15PM MDT until August 03 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELBERT COUNTY... At 515 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Simla, or 24 miles west of Limon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Elbert County, which includes Cedar Point. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
